Title: Reviving Tradition
Description:
The Prophet wished to personally ask for your help with the Tishamaat. But since he is working elsewhere, I asked you first to jumpstart our task.

My colleague and I have been working on a special project. And since the Prophet has declared today the Tishamaat, we will unveil it at the celebration!

For this, I need the emitter, but it needs an overhaul. We only have time for a hot wiring.

Get some filament and a soldering tool from the crates nearby, $n. Then maybe I can wire it to an array.
ObjectivesText: Help Romuul finish repairing the Holographic Emitter.
CompletionText: I regret not having apprentices in times like this.
RewardText:
<Romuul gives the newly seated crystal a test wiggle.>

Not my finest work, but it will do.

Light willing, it will remain functional until our project is revealed and the celebration is over.
